text: Biden’s spokesman on this eventful Friday evening >>>
author: HenryJGomez

text: .@TimRyan, who might run, too, has been saying the same. https://www.buzzfeednews.com/article/henrygomez/rep-tim-ryan-is-heading-to-iowa-and-new-hampshire-as-he …
author: HenryJGomez

text: It’s a fun movie to me now!
author: HenryJGomez

text: "But I don't blame them, because one time, I turned into a dog and they helped me."
author: HenryJGomez

text: Meet Dave Green, the UAW local president in Lordstown, Ohio, who this week unexpectedly found himself on the receiving end of a Donald Trump Twitter attack.
author: HenryJGomez

text: Growing up in the Youngstown area, UAW leaders were like local celebrities. And for this week, at least, Dave Green is a national celebrity, thanks to Trump's unexpected Twitter punch. https://www.buzzfeednews.com/article/henrygomez/trump-twitter-gm-dave-green …
author: HenryJGomez

text: UAW Local 1112 President Dave Green, targeted by Trump this week on Twitter: “Are there assholes in unions? Yeah,” he said. “There’s assholes in church, but I believe in God." https://www.buzzfeednews.com/article/henrygomez/trump-twitter-gm-dave-green …
author: HenryJGomez

text: “I was here working late and got a message on my phone: ‘Hey, this is Beto. Driving past Lordstown. Do you mind if I stop by and say hi?’ I was like, ‘I guess not. Are you gonna come stand on my table?’” https://www.buzzfeednews.com/article/henrygomez/trump-twitter-gm-dave-green …
author: HenryJGomez

text: Dave Green's life — already busy because of GM's woes in Lordstown, Ohio — turned upside down Sunday after a Trump tweet. Here's what that's all like, from the media crush to the @BetoORourke visit to having thousands of workers depending on you. https://www.buzzfeednews.com/article/henrygomez/trump-twitter-gm-dave-green …
author: HenryJGomez

text: Inside The Trump Storm With An Ohio Union Boss https://www.buzzfeednews.com/article/henrygomez/trump-twitter-gm-dave-green …
author: HenryJGomez

text: For what it's worth, the piece does note that the Biden theory has been knocked down ... just thought Chamberlain's thoughts were worth sharing as a peek at how people are thinking about things in this primary.
author: HenryJGomez

text: HIckenlOOPSer.
author: HenryJGomez

text: “We’re also going to name the people that are responsible for the mess that we’re in." @justicedems' Alexandra Rojas, on plans to scrutinize Biden's record in 2020.
author: HenryJGomez

text: .@alexis_levinson on how @JulianCastro carefully charted his future as the Democrats' big Texas future. And then along came Beto.
author: HenryJGomez

text: And here's Biden ally @ChrisCoons on the left's plotting against Biden: https://www.buzzfeednews.com/article/henrygomez/joe-biden-progressives-2020-election-primary …
author: HenryJGomez

text: .@SeanMcElwee on the challenge in taking on Biden from the left: "Everyone just sort of believes all this baggage he has will ‘hashtag’ cancel him from the race. ...But the gov of Virginia also had a blackface scandal, and no one talks about that anymore.” https://www.buzzfeednews.com/article/henrygomez/joe-biden-progressives-2020-election-primary …
author: HenryJGomez

text: There's no cohesive or coordinated effort. But progressive groups plan to emphasize Biden's record in a way that's at odds with him asserting that he'd be the most progressive 2020 candidate. https://www.buzzfeednews.com/article/henrygomez/joe-biden-progressives-2020-election-primary …
author: HenryJGomez

text: Leaders of the new left really don't want Joe Biden for president. I talked to some of them about what they plan to do about it. https://www.buzzfeednews.com/article/henrygomez/joe-biden-progressives-2020-election-primary …
author: HenryJGomez

text: I was only 6, but feels like Joshua Tree and Document hold up the best.
author: HenryJGomez

text: This doesn't even get into the local news coverage that Beto is getting not just in Iowa, but in the places (like Michigan and Ohio) he is visiting en route to New Hampshire.
author: HenryJGomez

text: "One time, according to a friend, Beto collected an especially verdant turd from one of their kids’ diapers and put it in a bowl, telling Amy it was avocado."
author: HenryJGomez

text: .@ScottWalker tells @jameshohmann:  “I’m not ruling anything out. My wife … told me, ‘Don’t pretend you wouldn’t" ever run again.
author: HenryJGomez

text: This is what @JohnKasich did five years ago as a precursor to his presidential campaign.
author: HenryJGomez

text: How a Cleveland car dealer planned to save GM's Lordstown plant https://www.freep.com/story/money/cars/general-motors/2019/03/19/cleveland-car-dealer-tried-save-gms-lordstown-assembly-plant/3205898002/ … via @freep
author: HenryJGomez

text: Former Ohio Democratic Party chair @ChrisRedfern419 slides into the @clevelanddotcom Facebook live feed with a message to Beto: "Hi. Go to Lordstown. Trust me."
author: HenryJGomez

text: .@BetoORourke is in Cleveland, praising @SherrodBrown for "coining" dignity of work. Live video here: https://www.facebook.com/clevelandcom/videos/804449439909675/?utm_source=twitter&utm_campaign=cleve_sf&utm_medium=social …
author: HenryJGomez

text: Traficant had to bring home pork for construction jobs and downtown development. I think voters there expect results from their populist firebrands.
author: HenryJGomez

text: That UAW local has a history of accepting concessions to make things work in Lordstown. They’ve also joined forces with the local chamber of commerce, which ain’t exactly a Democratic bunch, even in Youngstown.
author: HenryJGomez

text: This tweet is gonna be the talk of the Lordstown union hall and Youngstown’s tight-knit organized labor community all week.
author: HenryJGomez

text: Such a cool @MichaelMcIntyre story on Susie Porter, one of the sweetest, most hospitable people I have met in Cleveland.
author: HenryJGomez

text: (The senator is not identified by name.)
author: HenryJGomez

text: From ⁦@ConnieSchultz⁩: “I...stood in the back of a rally and watched one of my husband's colleagues praise freedom of the press... An hour later, at a private event, I listened to that same senator bash journalists as malicious and willfully stupid.”
author: HenryJGomez

text: Last night was a very This Is Your Life night for ⁦@JoeBiden⁩ in Delaware, where Democrats appreciate his bipartisan spirit even though it causes him trouble on the left.
author: HenryJGomez

text: I keep seeing how Beto, after a weekend of standing on countertops and running a 5K, says how great it would be for Biden to be in the race, too.
author: HenryJGomez

text: Pep rally vibes for @JoeBiden tonight in Dover, Delaware, including this very awkward suggestion from Tom Carper. https://www.buzzfeednews.com/article/henrygomez/joe-biden-mike-pence-bipartisanship …
author: HenryJGomez

text: .@JoeBiden is sorry not sorry about those nice things he said about Mike Pence. It's the Delaware way and should be the American way, he said Saturday in Dover, where he almost blurted out that he's running. https://www.buzzfeednews.com/article/henrygomez/joe-biden-mike-pence-bipartisanship …
author: HenryJGomez

text: Uh, so Biden just slipped and said he has the most progressive record of anyone who IS running. Crowd goes nuts, he quickly amends: "who would run."
author: HenryJGomez

text: Continuing that theme: "One of my closest friends in my entire career was John McCain."
author: HenryJGomez

text: Biden — still ruffled over the Pence-decent-guy flap? — talks about what being a Delaware Dem means to him: "We don’t treat the opposition as the enemy. … We might even say a nice word about a Republican when they do something good."
author: HenryJGomez

text: And here are the "Run, Joe, run!" chants.
author: HenryJGomez

text:
More Carney: "I’m not up here to break any news tonight. But in my humble opinion, we have never needed Joe Biden more than we need him right now."

Someone shouted out: "Joe 2020!"
author: HenryJGomez

text: Delaware Gov. John Carney, introducing Biden: "If you ask me, he doesn’t just look like he’s back. He looks like he’s ready for a fight."
author: HenryJGomez

text: Sonia Schorr Sloan, accepting Delaware Democrats' top award, tells the crowd she's worked on every Biden campaign. "I told him two weeks ago, I have one campaign left in me."
author: HenryJGomez

text:
Coons is up on stage now referring to Biden as the next president.

"Folks I am praying for that man, and I am excited to hear from him just a few minutes from now.
author: HenryJGomez

text: Now Sen. @TomCarperforDE is using a riff on border security to highlight past Biden initiatives. Bet you didn't think you'd hear so much about Plan Colombia tonight.
author: HenryJGomez

text: It's obviously a very Biden-friendly crowd here in Dover. The lieutenant gov, in her invocation, asked for the wind to be at Biden's back. The state party chair promised short remarks, since "they aren't here to see me."
author: HenryJGomez

text: I spoke with @ChrisCoons, who continues to be sort of a hype man for Biden's pre-candidacy. "I’ve urged Joe to run because I think he’s got the sort of heart and character, record and personality that we need at this point in our history."
author: HenryJGomez

text: Hello from Dover Downs Hotel and Casino in Ioa—er, Delaware, where @JoeBiden will headline a state Democratic Party dinner tonight.
author: HenryJGomez

text: So much of this has been sad to watch — from the inside and on the outside — over the last six years.
author: HenryJGomez
